name: ChartFill
description: Represents the fill formatting for a chart element.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clear the fill color of a chart element.

methods.name: setSolidColor
methods.description: Sets the fill formatting of a chart element to a uniform color.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: HTML color code representing the color of the border line, of the form #RRGGBB (e.g. "FFA500") or as a named HTML color (e.g. "orange").
